description:
Demanding ski touring ascents in the biting cold: The Swisswool Col Becchei Hybrid Jacket for men provides optimum protection and maximum freedom of movement.

Quilted, elastic and wind-resistant Tec Stretch material is used as the outer fabric of this lightweight insulated jacket. To provide maximum protection against wind and cold, insulation inserts made from 60g Swisswool have been set into the front and the upper arms. The lightweight Merino NatureTec Light inserts in the hood, sleeves and waist provide breathability and elasticity yet remain wind-resistant. Tasmanian merino wool on the inside naturally regulates the climate and makes the jacket pleasantly comfortable. Other features such as elastic inserts in the hood and cuffs, and backpack-compatible side pockets round off this hybrid jacket perfectly. For the sake of the environment, the hybrid jacket is PFC-FREE and climate-neutral.

The Swisswool Col Becchei Hybrid Jacket for men is a versatile ski touring companion, even in demanding conditions.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Col Becchei Hybrid Jacket - Mens
